text: 3:23 Rom 14:8; 1 Korin 11:3; 2 Korin 10:7; Galesia 3:29Ezɨ ia Kraisɨn adarasi, ezɨ Krais, Godɨn anav.3:23 1 Korin 1:12 ko 3:4, Pol kamaghɨn mɨgei, Korinɨn siosɨn itir darazi uari abɨgha, marazi ghaze, e Polɨn adarasi, ezɨ marazi ghaze, e Apolosɨn adarasi. Ezɨ mɨgɨrɨgɨar kaba da nguazimɨn gumazamizibar nɨghnɨzibar gɨn zui. Korinɨn siosɨn itir gumazamiziba deravɨra Godɨn nɨghnɨzim gɨfogh, egh kamaghɨn mɨkɨm suam, Pol bar en anav, ezɨ Apolos bar en anav. Pol ko Apolos ko bizir igharaziba sara, me ingangarir gumazamizibar mɨn ikɨ, Korinɨn siosɨn akurvagh egh me damutɨ, me guizɨn Kraisɨn adarazir mɨn otivam. Kamaghɨn, God me ginaba. Nɨ 2 Korin 3:1-9ɨn gan.
